plot: Set in the hauntingly beautiful wake of a disastrous flood, 'GRAW' takes us on a thrilling survival ride as a masked thief desperately fights to escape the post-apocalyptic graveyard he decided to rob. Will his greed cost him his life? Is there more than meets the eye to the man behind the mask? Enter the chilling and emotional tale of a man torn between survival and a ring.
title: Graw
